content: down dog anyone this is a yoga sock pattern that is so easy to make that you don t even have to think about it while knitting the socks are knitted in a k2 p2 ribbing the leg and foot are of medium length but you can always make the socks longer or shorter if you like the pattern includes two different options for binding off which you can use to knit the heel and toe part the pattern contains numbers for different shoe sizes but you can also use it as a general guideline and just cast on your usual amount of stitches
